lines.text: sex or the saw. Sex is, well... nobody knows. But the saw... the saw is family.
Dog will hunt. Get that bitch, Leatherface. Get that bitch!
[laughs]
Dog will hunt.
[when asked the secret of his successful chilli]
No secret, it's the meat. Don't skimp on the meat. I've got a real good eye for prime meat. Runs in the family.
You coonshits, you fudge packers, you'll be the death of me yet!
It's a dog eat dog world and from where I sit there just ain't enough damn dogs!
Peel that pig and slice him thick.

[to Stretch at the radio station]
Can you play Inna-Vida-da-Gadda?
I know nobody's listening 'cos you're all looming, but I got a shot of hot rock 'n roll for you anyway...
[takes a call]
KOKLA Red River Rock 'n Roll Request.
S-C-E-X, sex. Ya had to find out about it, didn't ya?
I'm the Lord of the Harvest!
What's that? Some new health food bunch?
Grandpa's strict liquid diet keeps him as fresh as a rose.

[referring to the chainsaw wielding Leatherface]
What the hell is that?
It's... It's some kind of a geek!

[seeing Chop-Top cutting up records]
Hey! What the shit?
Lick my plate, you dog dick!
Uh, I wanna... I wanna buy some uh, radio add time.

[getting nervous]
Are you fucking crazy? We are closed. Off the air till' tomorrow. You'll have to just... come... back...
No but... but yeah but... Whoa.
Just had another cursin' caller. Your little ass is gonna be in big trouble with that tape girl.
Look, darlin'. Built ya a little fry house.
The small bussinessman... always, always, always gets it in the ass.
NAM FLASHBACK!
Who sentcha? Those sissies over at Delmar catering? That chicken-shit burrito man?

[Hiding under the dinner table while Leatherface and Lefty fight]
Maybe it's just time to just shut down. Time to shut down the show, yeah. Yeah, pull the plug. Come here, Nubbins!
[Pulls the preserved corpse of the hitchhiker from the original film under the table and searches him]
Where... Where's that fuck you Charlie?
I wouldn't wish this rotten life off on a one-eyed ferret with mange.

[hitting L.G. in the head with a hammer]
Incoming mail!
[Buzz and Rick are on the phone to Stretch]
This is for Rick the Prick; he wants to hear "Bright Lights, Big Titties"!
Wrong! I don't wanna hear it - I wanna see it! "Bright Lights, Big Titties!" Woo!
Burn her like a rat! Burn her like a rat!
I thought you took care of her already.
Yeah well, Leatherface killed her once already, but LOOK! She's Red-faced. Oh, Bubba's been playing with her, Bubba likes her. Bubba's got a girlfriend!
Exit. E-X-I-T.
[When swinging for Stretch, Leatherface hits Chop Top on his head with the chainsaw by accident, exposing his metal place cover]

Her, not me you dumbass! Leatherface, you bitch! Look what you did to my Sonny Bono wig do... oh, goddamn I can't believe it! You gonna have to buy me a new plate cover! You gonna have to buy me a new plate cover, Leatherface! Oh... I'm gonna have to go back to the VA hospital to get me a new plate cover!
C'mon Bubba. Cook's out here chewing ass like it was steak... "We gotta run for that money now! Chase that dollar, boy! Gotta go fast to catch it... "
It's like super-feedback. Just... put the underwoofer across the overflapper.
One of those boys was so crazy he sawed his own head off going 90 miles per hour.
Oh my achin' banana!
[deleted scene]

[to Drayton]
Kiss my plate!
A man builds a good sturdy trade by hookin' and crookin' and then
[removes pin from grenade]
Ka plooey! The Gods just kick him right in the balls. Ah no! Not this time...
